replies.body:
Proof that players from the community and Riot working together can make the most **AMAZING **things!  

Seriously, completely blown away, great work!  Now, I have some people who I need to share some feelings with....

1) Annie is ripped. She's carrying Zac, Nasus, and Taric? Those guys look like they weigh 200 lb each. Kog'Maw looks like he weighs 160 lb.

2) Vi has never looked hotter.

3) They look like the cool kids from high school. And as a +, Ezreal looks like Korapica from Hunter x Hunter.

4) I know that Braum looks awesome but Teemo in the background, he looks so cool. Also, liking his new bandana scarf.

5) Like Nami, I give this last one a thumbs up with three hands.

we need to have a thing for feeders and k-s ers

(E.G. you can have my kills, Kill me.)
Kill-Secured, just like your heart {{champion:103}}

Ta-Da!

http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii149/Rinaty/Namilikes_zps0ab386c0.jpg

...because I can't do this right.
My valentine card for all ADC's out there
I really want that Nami giving the thumbs up as a summoner icon.
Using my below average photo editing skills, I have created Solo Nami.
Solo Nami FTW !!! {{champion:267}}

Roses are red
Snoop Dogg is dank
wow gg
noob jg dont gank

These are amazing~!

I already made a LoL Valentine of my own though.

http://meepinkuri.deviantart.com/art/LoL-Poro-Valentine-505963421

All about them poros~
Oskar, I like the way you art.
thank u omg {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

AHHHHH These turned out so good~!

Now I just need to send one to myself whenever I lose a game. Which is NEVER because I'm GREAT (nobody look up stats plz)
After looking up your match history ;) i see you ONLY play {{champion:127}} {{champion:89}}  and{{champion:54}}  lol such diversity
Whoa whoa I play Sejuani and Annie too! That's, like, five champs! Five!

Even if you lose a game, we'll still love you, thanks for making this game better rito guy. Happy Valentines. x)                    



(I think someone will still murder you if you lose one doe so don't lose) (つ°ヮ°)つ

why do you even put {{champion:161}}  to the supports? :c
That makes me sad {{item:3070}}
Those aren't supports, they just are showing the rest of the team and braum is the support they are talking about.
But there are five other champs...
I think that's the *other* team.

{{champion:17}} top
{{champion:33}}  jungle
{{champion:161}}  middle
{{champion:18}}  ADC
{{champion:43}} support

NOOO!!! It's:
{{champion:18}} Top
{{champion:17}} Jungle
{{champion:43}} Middle
{{champion:161}} Support
{{champion:33}} ADC
Correct.  The support sacrifices themselves frequently to protect their team against the enemy team.  Hence "We'll never forget you".
If you look at it. Braum is going agaisnt them. He's not part of their team.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VPuPWLU4hkU thats why
These are precious x3
Whew that Jayce is too handsome!
I know right?!  That 5 o'clock shadow too, haha. XD

Ezreal is not on the same card as Taric?


GJ, Riot, you ruined Valentine's Day.
Varus is Taric's new soulmate, screw Ez.
First attempt at adding some creative things to the community.

I love these! Blue sentinel's sultry "come hither" lean is maybe the best part. 

Case in point: http://i.imgur.com/GOZvoJx.jpg
Jayce 100% looks like Booker DeWitt on that card. Don't tell me he doesn't.
He doesn't.
Go get 'em buddy.
Oskar here! I'm so glad to see all the positive feedback on these! They were super fun to do, I wanna see what you guys come up with, so don't forget to customize your own! {{summoner:31}}
I couldn't help but burst down laughing and looking like an idiot when I saw the toplane card. It's so true... that island...
http://i.imgur.com/wg3WpS9.jpg
Niiiice
Niiiice
Brb, posting these on the facebook walls and twitter of literally every person I duo queue with in League! But seriously, these are *so *adorable. There's so much talent in the LoL community!
Riot, you should make a DFG Icon! For all the good times...
Heartseeker Jinx confirmed? :-D

More like
Mid: Says they're gonna destroy whoever they lane against, mid lane gets fed like an African relief camp
Jungle: Says I'll gank when I'm READY!!! at lvl 15
ADC: I can't carry with this TRASH team
Support: Why do Ialways get last pick ,this game sucks
Top: I hate Teemo, he sucks he's the worst champion in the game, they should just remove him, he is too hard to lane against he's terrible{{champion:17}}
I love Karma and how deceptive she looks.
YAAAAAAAAY OSKAR!!!!!!! He was one of my first art mutuals on Tumblr ;3;
Only Nami appreciates Jayce's hard work in the top lane. Poor Jayce.
